actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making an additional appropriation for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.

summary.text: Makes an additional appropriation of $20,000,000 to the National Institute of Arthritis, Rheumatism, Metabolic Diseases, and Digestive Diseases for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.

titles.title: A bill making an additional appropriation for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.
